sentences.en: A cacophony of firecrackers, vuvuzelas, car horns and cheers rang out across Madrid.
sentences.cn: 鞭炮声, 呜呜祖啦声, 汽车鸣笛声混杂着响彻马德里.

sentences.en: All around was a cacophony of voices.
All around was bubbling a cacophony of voices.
Amid the brutal, ugly cacophony of war, Lilli Marlene always a sweet and tender note.
sentences.cn: 在残酷丑陋的战争喧嚣中, 丽莉·琳总是用她那温柔甜蜜的音符去抚慰人们心灵的创伤.

sentences.en: Amid the brutal, ugly cacophony of war, Lilli Marlene always struck a sweet and tender note.
sentences.cn: 在残酷丑陋的战争喧嚣中, 丽莉·玛琳总是用她那温柔甜蜜的音符去抚慰人们心灵的创伤.

sentences.en: From its cacophony of sound, the room has suddenly become very still.
sentences.cn: 本来众声嘈杂的屋子里,突然变得非常肃静.

sentences.en: If everyone can contribute, the possibility for cacophony is great.
sentences.cn: 每个人都可以投稿, 杂音的可能性很大.

sentences.en: Instant cacophony as the crowd inched forward step by step, coming, they're coming!
sentences.cn: 紧跟着人声嘈乱起来,整群的人象机器似的一齐向前拥了一寸,又一寸, 来了! 来了!

sentences.en: Nature's symphonic world was drowned by man's industrial cacophony.
sentences.cn: 大自然的和声世界被人类的工业噪音淹没了.

sentences.en: Our meal came, and the cacophony continued.
sentences.cn: 我们的饭菜上来了.那刺耳的声音仍在继续.

sentences.en: People's screams a cacophony at times.
sentences.cn: 人们的尖叫声混合成不协调的噪音.

sentences.en: Perhaps he needs to remember, amid cacophony, that some of the best conductors are despots.
sentences.cn: 或许他需要记住, 不调和中, 有一些最好的指挥是专制者.

sentences.en: Put sound on a few hundred a real cacophony emerges in the open - air cubicle environment.
sentences.cn: 把音效放到几百台电脑上,在开放式的工作间中就会产生刺耳的杂音.

sentences.en: The cacophony lasted a long time and then suddenly stopped.
sentences.cn: 那个(刺耳的声音)持续了好久然后突然停止了.

sentences.en: The drivers behind him honked, and the cacophony grew louder.
sentences.cn: 后面的司机还在按喇叭, 且那刺耳的声音越来越大.

sentences.en: The moderator for this meeting Eric Hughes, tries to quiet the cacophony of loud, opinionated voices.
sentences.cn: 会议的主持人,埃里克·休斯, 试图平息大声嘈杂的 、 固执己见的声音.

words.tran_cn: 粗腔横调的；发音不和谐的

trans.tran_cn: 刺耳的声音，不和谐的声音
trans.tran_en: a loud unpleasant mixture of sounds
